descriptor.name: Spring Data GemFire Project (Standalone)
descriptor.description: Creates a Spring Data GemFire project with an embedded cache and one region that runs as a standalone Java application.

descriptor.name: Spring Data GemFire Cache Server Project (Standalone)
descriptor.description: Creates a GemFire Cache Server project with a cache server, embedded cache and one region that runs as a standalone Java application.

descriptor.name: Spring Data GemFire Cache Server Project (WAR)
descriptor.description: Creates a GemFire Cache Server project with a cache server, embedded cache and one region that runs as a web application.

descriptor.name: Spring Data GemFire Client Project
descriptor.description: Creates a Spring Data GemFire project with a client cache and client region that runs as a standalone Java application.
